name: Will You Die? (Blastherominer)
description:
Welcome to Will You Die? In this short game you have to try to guess which door to go through, or else you will die.

This game requires Microsoft Powerpoint to play.

This project is very short and is easy to complete. More games will come soon using other game engines(Including Unity).

All sounds were from the Powerpoint sound catalog. Some sounds might not be working if you are playing on a mobile device.

Please do not click anywhere except for designated areas. This is to prevent cheating.
